verses.plain: A wise son heareth his father’s instruction: but a scorner heareth not rebuke.

tokens.t: A wise son
his father’s instruction: but a scorner heareth not rebuke.

verses.plain: A man shall eat good by the fruit of his mouth: but the soul of the transgressors shall eat violence.

tokens.t: A man shall eat good by the fruit of
mouth: but the soul of the transgressors
violence.

verses.plain: He that keepeth his mouth keepeth his life: but he that openeth wide his lips shall have destruction.

tokens.t: He that keepeth his mouth keepeth his life:
he that openeth wide his lips shall have destruction.

verses.plain: The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.

tokens.t: The soul of the sluggard desireth, and
nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.

verses.plain: A righteous man hateth lying: but a wicked man is loathsome, and cometh to shame.

tokens.t: A righteous
hateth lying: but a wicked
is loathsome, and cometh to shame.

verses.plain: Righteousness keepeth him that is upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner.

tokens.t: Righteousness keepeth
upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner.

verses.plain: There is that maketh himself rich, yet hath nothing: there is that maketh himself poor, yet hath great riches.

tokens.t: There is that maketh himself rich, yet
nothing:
that maketh himself poor, yet
great riches.

verses.plain: The ransom of a man’s life are his riches: but the poor heareth not rebuke.

tokens.t: The ransom of a man’s life
his riches: but the poor heareth not rebuke.

verses.plain: The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out.

tokens.t: The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out.

verses.plain: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.

tokens.t: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised
wisdom.

verses.plain: Wealth gotten by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase.

tokens.t: Wealth
by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase.

verses.plain: Hope deferred maketh the heart sick: but when the desire cometh, it is a tree of life.

tokens.t: Hope deferred maketh the heart sick: but
the desire cometh,
a tree of life.

verses.plain: Whoso despiseth the word shall be destroyed: but he that feareth the commandment shall be rewarded.

tokens.t: Whoso despiseth the word shall be destroyed: but he that feareth the commandment shall be rewarded.

verses.plain: The law of the wise is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.

tokens.t: The law of the wise
a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.

verses.plain: Good understanding giveth favour: but the way of transgressors is hard.

tokens.t: Good understanding giveth favour: but the way of transgressors
hard.

verses.plain: Every prudent man dealeth with knowledge: but a fool layeth open his folly.

tokens.t: Every prudent
dealeth with knowledge: but a fool layeth open
folly.

verses.plain: A wicked messenger falleth into mischief: but a faithful ambassador is health.

tokens.t: A wicked messenger falleth into mischief: but a faithful ambassador
health.

verses.plain: Poverty and shame shall be to him that refuseth instruction: but he that regardeth reproof shall be honoured.

tokens.t: Poverty and shame
him that refuseth instruction: but he that regardeth reproof shall be honoured.

verses.plain: The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul: but it is abomination to fools to depart from evil.

tokens.t: The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul: but
abomination to fools to depart from evil.

verses.plain: He that walketh with wise men shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed.

tokens.t: He that walketh with wise
shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed.

verses.plain: Evil pursueth sinners: but to the righteous good shall be repayed.

tokens.t: Evil pursueth sinners: but to the righteous good shall be repayed.

verses.plain: A good man leaveth an inheritance to his children’s children: and the wealth of the sinner is laid up for the just.

tokens.t: A good
leaveth an inheritance to his children’s children: and the wealth of the sinner
laid up for the just.

verses.plain: Much food is in the tillage of the poor: but there is that is destroyed for want of judgment.

tokens.t: Much food
the tillage of the poor: but there is
destroyed for want of judgment.

verses.plain: He that spareth his rod hateth his son: but he that loveth him chasteneth him betimes.

tokens.t: He that spareth his rod hateth his son: but he that loveth him chasteneth him betimes.

verses.plain: The righteous eateth to the satisfying of his soul: but the belly of the wicked shall want.

tokens.t: The righteous eateth to the satisfying of his soul: but the belly of the wicked shall want.

footnotes.text: by labour: Heb. with the hand
shall be rewarded: or, shall be in peace
a faithful…: Heb. an ambassador of faithfulness
